definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: restrain, retain (NH id.; cf. prob. As eṣêru, retain, restrain, Dl:HWB 122 Jäger:BAS i. 483 Zehnpfund:ib. 500; Eth. 9as’ara: press, Ar. 9as.ara; Targum [[עֲחַר]] Syr. 9s.ar id.);—

restrain, c. acc. pers. Ge 16:2 (J; + [[מִן]], i.e. prevent), [[עָחׂר עָחַר]] [[בְּעֵד כָּל־רֶחֶם]] Ge 20:18 (E), cf. abs. Is 66:9 (opp. [[מוֹלִיד]]); sq. inf. 2Ki 4:24; c. acc. pers. alone 1Ki 18:44 hinder, stop; c. acc. of sky (hindering rain) De 11:17, 2Ch 7:13; pt. pass. abs. shut up, or hindered (for reasons not given) Je 36:5, Ne 6:10 (? by a vow, or by ceremonial uncleanness, cf. Rs:Sem i. 436 f., 2nd ed. 455 f.); = shut up (c. [[ב]], in prison) 2Ki 17:4, pt. pass. Je 33:1, Je 39:15, fig. Je 20:9; on [[עָחוּר וְעָזוּב]] (5 t.) v. I. [[עזב]]; [[עֲחֻרָה לָנוּ]] 1Sa 21:6 women have been kept away with ref. to us (cf. RS:l. c.); [[עָחוּר]] [[מִפְּנֵי]] 1Ch 12:1 kept away from before Saul; = detain, c. acc. Ju Jdg 13:15, Jdg 13:16; in Jb c. [[בְּ]], [[בְּמִלִּין]] ´[[ע]] Job 4:2, cf. Job 29:9, so [[בַּמַּיִם]] Job 12:5; [[בְּעַמִּי]] ´[[ע]] 1Sa 9:17 is rule over, etc. (si vera l.); ins. also (with other words) 1Sa 10:1 LXX We Dr al.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: be restrained, stayed, of plague: Pf. 3 fs. [[נֶעֱחָָרָה]] Nu 17:15; Impf. 3 fs. [[תֵּעָחַר]] 2Sa 24:27 = 1Ch 21:22, [[וַתֵּעָחַר]] Nu 17:13, Nu 25:8 (P) 2Sa 24:25, Ps 106:30; be shut up (of sky), Inf. cstr. [[בְּהֵעָחֵר]] 1Ki 8:35 = 2Ch 6:26; be under restraint or detention Pt. [[נֶעְחָר]] 1Sa 21:8 + ´[[לִפְחנֵי י]] (? i.e. kept by a vow, cf. HPS and Ne 6:10 supr.).
